professional_summary: Experienced I.T. Support Technician providing customer service to faculty and students with expertise in network troubleshooting, software optimization, and database management.

Resolved issues quickly in a fast-paced environment to expedite voting.
Set up and designed networks on the fly
and configured over 300 Evids with scripts.

repairing user errors and hardware malfunctions.
